conversion.desc: Number of confirmed emissions-related DTCs available for display

conversion.true: EGR and/or VVT System Test Available
EGR and/or VVT System Test Unavailable
EGR and/or VVT System Test Incomplete
EGR and/or VVT System Test Complete
Fuel System 1: Open Loop: Insufficient engine temperature
Fuel System 1: Closed Loop: Using oxygen sensor feedback to determine fuel mix
Fuel System 1: Open Loop: Due to engine load OR fuel cut due to acceleration
Fuel System 1: Open Loop: Due to system failure
Fuel System 1: Closed loop: Using at least one oxygen sensor, but there is a fault in the feedback system
Fuel System 2: Open Loop: Insufficient engine temperature
Fuel System 2: Closed Loop: Using oxygen sensor feedback to determine fuel mix
Fuel System 2: Open Loop: Due to engine load OR fuel cut due to acceleration
Fuel System 2: Open Loop: Due to system failure
Fuel System 2: Closed loop: Using at least one oxygen sensor, but there is a fault in the feedback system
From the outside atmosphere or off
